description: 20/20 SeedSense boot failure or stuck on logo screen
recommended_action: Check power connections - verify 12V supply clean - try firmware recovery via USB
Inspect row harness connectors for corrosion - check CAN bus wiring - verify row module power

description: SpeedTube belt slipping or stalling at high speed
recommended_action: Check belt tension - inspect for seed debris in tube - verify motor current draw - replace belt

description: SpeedTube not calibrated - seeds bunching at furrow
recommended_action: Run SpeedTube calibration from 20/20 - match belt speed to ground speed - check motor encoder

description: vSet meter singulation below 98% with treated seed
recommended_action: Verify disc selection for seed size - check vacuum pressure - inspect disc for wear or buildup

description: vDrive electric motor overheating at high population rates
recommended_action: Check motor ventilation - verify population within motor RPM limits - inspect wiring for chafe
Inspect cylinder seals - check hydraulic connections - verify system pressure at manifold

description: DeltaForce not maintaining target force on rough ground
recommended_action: Recalibrate load cells - check accumulator charge - verify hydraulic flow rate adequate

description: SmartDepth actuator not responding to depth changes
recommended_action: Check actuator wiring - verify CAN communication with 20/20 - inspect mechanical linkage

description: CleanSweep hydraulic hose leaking at row unit
recommended_action: Replace hose fitting - check for rubbing against row unit frame - verify routing

description: FurrowForce closing wheels not following ground contour
recommended_action: Check pivot bushings for wear - verify hydraulic pressure - inspect closing wheel condition

description: FurrowJet nozzles clogging with fertilizer crystals
recommended_action: Flush system with clean water - check in-line strainers - use recommended fertilizer grades

description: SmartFirmer OM readings inconsistent field to field
recommended_action: Clean sensor surfaces - recalibrate to local soil - check for moisture on sensor face

description: WaveVision showing seed spacing wider than actual
recommended_action: Recalibrate sensor alignment in seed tube - check for seed tube damage - update firmware

description: 20/20 Connect sync failing with cloud platform
recommended_action: Check cellular modem signal - verify account subscription - power cycle modem and display

description: vApply HD servo valve stuck or slow response
recommended_action: Flush valve with clean water - check wiring connections - replace valve if crystallization damage

description: mSet hybrid switching delayed at zone boundaries
recommended_action: Verify GPS accuracy for zone detection - check meter response time - adjust lookahead distance
